articles.title: Peloton issues stop-ride and voluntary recall of 2.2 million bikes - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Consumers should "immediately stop using" the bikes, as rider suffers fractured wrist
articles.content:
Amercian indoor cycling behemoth, Peloton, is recalling close to 2.2 million bikes due to a fault in the seatpost that could lead to it breaking unexpectedly.

articles.title: UK economy limps along as high inflation hits spending - CNN
articles.description: The United Kingdom's economy limped along in the first quarter of this year as consumers spent less on services and strike action took its toll.
articles.content:
